title: Vampires
description: The previously unreleased 1958 documentary by the Maysles Brothers, who spent ten years documenting a house of vampires, but recorded very little interesting footage.
quote: House meeting item number 1. I want to talk about general hygiene in the cell. Please please please finish a whole victim before moving on to the next.
parent: What We Do in the Shadows
altHero: black and white grainy film: Nadja and Nandor
alt1: the vampires gather in a sitting room
alt3: Laszlo stands next to a headless Frankensteinâ€™s monster-esque body of sewn together parts
